description: N8N workflow for Visa2Any automation platform
name: Revenue Optimization - Intelligent Upsell

data.query: SELECT c.*, cp.family_members, cp.has_dependents, cp.plans_to_immigrate, cp.interested_in_citizenship, cp.budget_range FROM clients c LEFT JOIN client_profiles cp ON c.id = cp.client_id WHERE c.id = $1

data.columns: client_id, campaign_id, visa_approved_date, opportunities, total_value, campaign_data, status, created_at
client_id, campaign_id, sequence_step, type, scheduled_for, content, subject, cta, priority, status
